name: B.A.S.S.
description:
B.A.S.S. is a light-hearted online multiplayer build-a-sentence shooter that melds the classic build-a-sentence party game with a FPS. Choose your own character and input a list of wacky words before you enter the colourful arena of B.A.S.S. Get a group of friends together or play it at your next gathering for some light-hearted fun. 

Made with Unity using Photon as part of the 7dfps challenge (December 2021)

  • Art and animation - Luc Wolthers
  • Level design - Robbie Fraser
  • Game design and writing - Skye Scott
  • Programming - Sam Alfred
  • Sound design - Jay Sutherland
  • Voices - The Swellenjam Crew
